tab1.text1:
Our mission is to create a balanced gaming experience that caters to both work and play.
As we embark on this adventure, we've carefully fine-tuned the server settings for an optimal gaming environment.


Server Settings:

Harvest Rates: 3x
Taming: 10x
Egg Hatch Time: 10x
Maturation Rate: 10x
Player Stat Increase: 50
 Dino Stat Increase: 40


At present, the maximum dino level is set to 180, and we're open to adjusting this in the 
future based on community feedback.

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.LightBlue>Discord Rules:</>




\Before reading any rules, this should go without saying. Please use common sense and common courtesy.


No offensive messages or nicknames - Anything that a reasonable person might find offensive.

No spam - This includes but is not limited too, loud/obnoxious noises in voice, @mention spam, character spam, image spam, and message spam.

No harassment - behavior that demeans, humiliates or embarrasses a person Including encouraging of harassment.  No Exceptions

Use the appropriate channels. - lol, not even going to bother.


These rules are enforced by any and all Admin & Moderators.
tab2.text2:
Some general rules, so everyone is on the same page. As a warning, just because something isn't listed here doesn't mean that it's allowed and this list may be updated accordingly. Use your best judgement when conducting yourself.

We ask that there be no griefing (harassing players so much that they quit).  EXCESSIVE VERBAL ABUSE IS CONSIDERED GRIEFING.

Hacking or cheating of any kind is not tolerated. You will face immediate ban without appeal if you are found to be hacking. Evidence of hacking must be provided when reporting a hacker (videos are best for this).

PvP can get heated sometimes, but personal, directed harassment is not tolerated. This includes but is not limited to: posting personal information, posting account information, racism or hate mongering, heavy/explicit sexual language, death threats, etc. If you are the victim of any of the above, please report the individuals responsible including screenshots

Impersonating a Admin, which should be obvious, is not allowed.

Inappropriate or offensive names are not allowed. Ie. names containing vulgar, defamatory, obscene, hateful, racially, ethnically or otherwise offensive, including any usernames which are sexual in nature.

Any and all situations where you can build inside or under the terrain are not allowed.

Box Quetzals as they are affectionally known in the community are not allowed. You are not allowed to use unintended building mechanics to box your quetzal (or other platform creatures) in to protect it from taking damage. Unintended building mechanics include floating structures of any kind.

No blocking artifacts. It will be seen as an attempt to ruin the game for other players and any number of consequences can befall tribes that do so, up to and including bans.


If you are warned for any of the reasons above and fail to comply, you can be temporarily or permanently banned from the server.
